summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Fremont Avenue, from North 64th Street to North 65th Street; Aurora Avenue, from North 65th Street to North 66th Street; and North 65th Street, from Fremont Avenue to West Green Lake Way; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6430, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
